title: My placements are 2/5 i had 3 games with an afk
body: i am 2/5 placements 3 out of these games had an afk. the one i just finished had 2 afk so i was like ok its over so the whole team sat and waited for game to end. after the game end i got low priority queue for 5 game 20 minutes each. this is so stupid you cant remake unless they dont join at all but if they join then dc you are completely fucked

replies.body:
The /Remake system only activates towards the beginning of the game if someone has been inactive for 90 or more seconds within the first 3 minutes of the match. If someone is inactive later in the match, the appropriate action to take is to report them after the match. We have the [Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) to address most of these automatically, however, a report can help if someone is going out of their way to create negative experiences for others.

It's impossible to incur 5x 20min low priority queue on the first occurrence of a disconnection, as it takes a trend of disconnections to get that penalty. If you're having technical issues that are causing you to disconnect, please let me know so I can assist you in resolving it. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Then isnt it unfair while we were losing LP (obviously becoz of afk but then theres nothing we can do to prevent from losing it) but justifiable to only to report that player afterwards and suddenly it is justifiable for me losing LP? If im afk in the middle of the game, it is my fault and i shouldnt let others suffer the same cause as i did. And i believe same goes to the others whether u r intentional afk or dc, team should be punished by losing LP (which cause great dissatisfaction in game) becoz we were put into disadvantage from afks
Yeah its broken system that doesnt work but riot likes to pretend it does.

I had a game the other day where our Xerath mid didn't connect from the start of the match and was in fountain past 3 minutes, however, when we went to /remake we got the normal message of "There must be one or more players who failed to connect to the match in order to /remake" (something along those lines) and were unable to remake the game. I'm sure this is a rare occurrence and I don't know what caused remake to fail but I thought it was something I should share so that it does not occur to others in the future.
